parameters.name: numreps
parameters.description: This many reps of the 20-trial design (6 reps + 2= 122 trials was used by Huettel & McCarthy)

parameters.name: responsemode
parameters.label: Response Mode
parameters.description: Response method: auto (platform-aware), keyboardShift (L/R shift), keyboardSafe (Z/slash for web), mousetarget (click targets), mousebutton (L/R mouse buttons), touchtarget (tap targets, hides footer)
